name: Gender Bali VR
description:
Gender Bali VR. You playing game with “Panggul”, panggul as Stick Drum. In Game there is a video tutorial or you can watch it on Youtube with your other device. For reset position camera press “dash” using dash menu on oculus. At Gameplay you press “Menu Button” for have controller for pause, and show video tutorial and show pause menu and show tutorial playing traditional music Gender bali music instrumental.

Support Devices Oculus Rift/S.
